item.title: [HBASE-15185] Fix jdk8 javadoc warnings for branch-1.1
item.description: This link shows jdk8 javadoc warnings for current branch-1.1 code base.

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

comments.comment: You read my mind

Still preparing the patch, have fixed over 800 warnings and still more left... Will attach the final patch after all javadoc warnings get cleared in my local check.
Thanks for the effort Yu Li. This will be easier to review and commit if you do patches per module, or at least hbase-server separate from the rest.
Yes sir, I'm now exactly working on the hbase-server module, and there're really quite some javadoc to fix... will attach a WIP patch for an initial look
Cancel patch to avoid WIP patch trigger HadoopQA
